member.name: M:Devices.ZED.Enum.DynamicZEDDevicesEnumDefinition.AddEntry(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an entry to the enum that can optionally have an object associated as its tag
member.param: Name of the entry to add
Optional: Object associated to the enum entry

member.name: M:Devices.ZED.Enum.DynamicZEDDevicesEnumDefinition.RemoveEntry(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given entry from the enum
member.param: Name of the entry to remove

member.name: M:Devices.ZED.Enum.DynamicZEDDevicesEnumDefinition.ClearEntries
member.summary: Removes all entries from the enum
